app.api.engines package¶

Submodules¶

app.api.engines.ContentEngine module¶

class app.api.engines.ContentEngine.ContentEngine¶

Bases: object

train()¶

Train the engine.

Create a TF-IDF matrix of unigrams, bigrams, and trigrams for each product. The 'stop_words' param tells the TF-IDF module to ignore common english words like 'the', etc.

Then we compute similarity between all products using SciKit Leanr's linear_kernel (which in this case is equivalent to cosine similarity).

Iterate through each item's similar items and store the 100 most-similar. Stops at 100 because well... how many similar products do you really need to show? Similarities and their scores are stored in redis as a Sorted Set, with one set for each item.

Returns:Nothin!
train_item(item_id)¶
